Update on Dynasonics TFX Ultra Platform | December 19, 2013
Confidential & Proprietary
Dear Dynasonics Representative: We are pleased to announce the new general safety AC line power and DC power Dynasonics TFX Ultra transmitters are released for shipment. When ordering the new transmitters, the certification approval option “N” is now available for all power source selections. In the meantime, the hazardous area transmitters with Ethernet communications or AC line power remain on hold. If you have any open orders that need to be converted from hazardous area approval to general safety or another alternative, please contact your Badger Meter representative to revise your orders. > Download Summary Table of TFX Ultra Transmitters and Shipping Status The temporary price reduction on Dynasonics TFX Ultra transmitters with 24V AC power options, which was previously communicated on November 25, 2013, remains in effect for all orders received by January 16, 2014. We appreciate your business and regret the inconvenience that this product hold has caused. We will continue to provide regular updates. Sincerely, Cheryl Ades Anspach Marketing Manager
